messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Not mice, but an ANT tip =)
messages.msgSnippet: I will remember this and try it in the future. I ve never heard of using cinnamon. Thanks for sharing that Kristine! Karin balikris@aol.com wrote: Hello all,
messages.messageBody:
I will remember this and try it in the future. I've never heard of using cinnamon.
Thanks for sharing that Kristine!

Karin





balikris@... wrote:

Hello all,
All this talk of mice reminds me of a remedy that I use and have discovered
that many of my acquaintances are not aware of. If you have ant problems,
CINNAMON is the cure. Sprinkling it around areas they invade with drive them
away. Trust me, it works!
Kristine


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

Hello all,
All this talk of mice reminds me of a remedy that I use and have discovered
